璚璚璚
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

Related Character(s): 瓊
Связанный символ (и): 瓊

璚字的基本解释

璚
qióng
古同“琼”，赤色的玉，泛指美玉：丹璚。

璚
jué
古同“玦”，古代环形有缺口的佩玉。
形状像璚的日晕。

璚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qióng］
［《廣韻》渠營切，平清，羣。］
(1)同“瓊1”。
(2)古代天文学用语。指日旁带状的云气。

璚字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璚； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页742第03
【廣韻】【正韻】渠營切【集韻】葵營切，?音瓊。【說文】赤玉也。【廣韻】同瓊。【嵆喜答嵆康詩】俯漱神泉，仰嘰璚枝。　又【字彙補】老鹿年久，角中生玉。名曰鹿璚。　又【集韻】古穴切。同玦，玉佩也。

璚字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
璚字的起名意思

暂无。

Zhu
Basic explanation of words
Zhu
qióng
In ancient times, "Qiong", red jade, refers to beautiful jade in general: Danzhu.
Zhu
jué
In ancient times, it is the same as "Juan", an ancient jade with a gap in the ring.
A solar halo shaped like a jug.
Zhu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qióng］
["Guangyun" Qu Yingqie, Pingqing, Qun. ]
(1) Same as "Joan 1".
(2) Ancient astronomical terms. Refers to the band-shaped cloud next to the sun.
Zhu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璚; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 742 03
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Qu Ying cut [Ji Yun] Kui Ying cut,? Yin Qiong. [Said the text] Chi Yu also. 【Guang Yun】Same as Qiong. [Rong Xi Answers the Poems of Rong Kang] Looking down at the Shenquan, looking up at the branches.　[Vocabulary supplement] The old deer is old, and jade is born in the horns. The name is Lu Yan.　[Jiyun] Ancient acupoint cut again. Same as Jue and Yupei too.
Zhu
